name: Zambia Air Services Training Institute (ZASTI)
about: The Zambia Air Services Training Institute (ZASTI) is a renowned aviation training institution established in 1969 to meet the local civil aviation industry's training needs. Strategically located near the Kenneth Kaunda International Airport, ZASTI offers a range of programs, including air traffic controller training and private pilot license courses, all aligned with national and international standards. With highly qualified and experienced staff, ZASTI provides thorough and professional training, utilizing state-of-the-art facilities and equipment. The institute is the only one in Zambia offering various aviation courses under one management and has a strong track record of producing skilled aviation professionals. ZASTI also offers hostel facilities and a responsive management team, ensuring a comprehensive and supportive learning environment. Dedicated to excellence, ZASTI continues to be a leading provider of aviation training in the region.
